title: Did Conservative Commentator Stephen Moore Advocate Child Labor Beginning at Age 11?
subtitle: U.S. President Donald Trump's choice for Federal Reserve governor faced scrutiny of his past writings and pronouncements in the spring of 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Conservative commentator Stephen Moore once said: "I'd get rid of a lot of these child labor laws, I want people starting to work at 11, 12."
